Privacy Policy

Your privacy is critically important to us. At the Luxury Charter Group we have a few fundamental principles:

  • We don’t ask you for personal information unless we truly need it. (We can’t stand services that ask you for things like your gender or income level for no apparent reason.)
  • We don’t share your personal information with anyone except to comply with the law, develop our website, or protect our rights.
  • We don’t store personal information on our servers unless required for the on-going operation of one of our services.

Below is our privacy policy which incorporates these goals:

The Luxury Charter Group operates the website at luxurychartergroup.com. It is the Luxury Charter Group’s policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website

Website Visitors

Like most website operators, the Luxury Charter Group collects non-personally-identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. the Luxury Charter Group’s purpose in collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how the Luxury Charter Group’s visitors use its website. From time to time, the Luxury Charter Group may release non-personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.

Gathering of Personally-Identifying Information

Certain visitors to the Luxury Charter Group’s website choose to interact with the Luxury Charter Group in ways that require the Luxury Charter Group to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that the Luxury Charter Group gathers depends on the nature of the interaction. For example, we ask visitors who request quotes to provide personal information like their name, phone number and email address. In each case, the Luxury Charter Group collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor’s interaction with the Luxury Charter Group. The Luxury Charter Group does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as described below. And visitors can always refuse to supply personally-identifying information, with the caveat that it may prevent them from engaging in certain website-related activities.

Aggregated Statistics

The Luxury Charter Group may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its websites. The Luxury Charter Group may display this information publicly or provide it to others. However, the Luxury Charter Group does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as described below.

Protection of Certain Personally-Identifying Information

The Luxury Charter Group discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on the Luxury Charter Group’s behalf or to provide services available at the Luxury Charter Group’s website, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others. Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may be located outside of your home country; by using the Luxury Charter Group’s website, you consent to the transfer of such information to them. The The Luxury Charter Group will not rent or sell potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information to anyone. Other than to its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations, as described above, the Luxury Charter Group discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only when required to do so by law, or when the Luxury Charter Group believes in good faith that disclosure is reasonably necessary to protect the property or rights of the Luxury Charter Group, third parties or the public at large. If you have contacted us and supplied your email address or joined our email list, the Luxury Charter Group may occasionally send you an email to tell you about new features, solicit your feedback, or just keep you up to date with what’s going on. The Luxury Charter Group takes all measures reasonably necessary to protect against the unauthorized access, use, alteration or destruction of potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information.

Cookies

A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor’s computer, and that the visitor’s browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. The Luxury Charter Group uses cookies to help the Luxury Charter Group identify and track visitors, their usage of the Luxury Charter Group website, and their website access preferences. The Luxury Charter Group visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using the Luxury Charter Group’s websites, with the drawback that certain features of the Luxury Charter Group’s websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.

Privacy Policy Changes

Although most changes are likely to be minor, the Luxury Charter Group may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in the Luxury Charter Group’s sole discretion. The Luxury Charter Group encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.
